name: Color maze (IncogKneeToe)
description:
Controls:

Moving the ball:
Arrow buttons ( <- -> ) to move horizontally
Arrow up to jump

Changing layers:
Click buttons on the top-right to change color

This is a memory game. All the color layers will be shown at the start of the level. Click a different color button (on the top-right) to switch between the color layers.

Try finishing the maze while always staying on a color. If you change the color and you're not standing on the color after it switches, you lose.

Finish is on the most top right red layer.

edit: added menu, different levels and game over screen after deadline
